excerpt.rendered:
Vial | 5 ml | gm
Active ingredients :
• Dmae 25 mg/ml
• Organic silicium 15 mg/ml

Benefits :
• Dimethylaminoethanol acts immediately to improve the appearance of sagging and flaccid skin. Its firming action works by protecting the elastin and collagen cross-links.
• DMAE provides an instant face or body-lift effect, while defending the skin against free radicals and simultaneously infusing it with moisture.
• DMAE started to be used in external use to produce a lifting effect. It is a natural compound in our body.
• A precursor of acetylcholine, a neuro-mediator which plays an important role in the skin. Keratinocytes, fibroblasts, myofibroblasts, sweat cells and endothelial cells, have membrane receptors and respond to acetylcholine.
• Organic silica :Binds moisture into the epidermis and therefore strengthens the skin .
• Improves skin elasticity .

DMAE for :
• Firms the skin on the neck and body .
• Anti-aging , early signs of ageing .
• Reduces & prevents stretch marks .
• Increase the skin elasticity .
• Stimulates collagen production .

Areas of treatment :
• Face
• Neck
• Body

How to use ?
By injection or derma-pen
Without dilution
